title: I Wanna Take You Down
lyrics:
[Chorus]
Wanna take you down, wanna take you down
Wanna take you down, wanna take you down
Wanna take you down, wanna take you down
Wanna take you down, wanna take you
[Verse 1]
Mood's right for love
And you're the one
Let's just stand for a while, for a while
Let's go down
Let's go deep undercover
Get into each other
I'll let you choose the style
When it's time to take you down
[Pre-Chorus]
Want to take you down
Wanna love you, baby, like nobody ever loved you before
Want to take you down
Gonna love you, baby, love you, baby, love, love
[Chorus]
Wanna take you down, wanna take you down
Wanna take you down, wanna take you down
Wanna take you down, wanna take you down
Wanna take you down

[Verse 2]
Oh, don't move fast
Keep it slow, baby, make it last
Oh, 'cause I feel so aroused, so aroused
Take you down, take you down, take you down
[Pre-Chorus]
Oh, 
want to take you down
I wanna love you, baby, like nobody ever loved you before
Want to take you down
Oh, gonna love you, baby, love you, baby, love, love
[Chorus]
Wanna take you down, wanna take you down
Wanna take you down, wanna take you down
Wanna take you down, wanna take you down
Wanna take you down, wanna take you
[Bridge]
Get down, get dirty
When I'm lovin' you, baby
Don't you know?
Oh, I'm ready
[Pre-Chorus]
Want to take you down
Take you down, baby
I wanna love you, baby, like nobody ever loved you before
Want to take you down
Gonna feel real good, baby
Want to take you down
I wanna love you, baby, love you, baby, love, love

[Chorus]
Wanna take you down, wanna take you down
Wanna take you down, wanna take you down
Wanna take you down, wanna take you down
Wanna take you down, wanna take you
[Post-Chorus]
Tell me, tell me, tell me how you feel, baby, yeah
Oh, my baby, my baby, my baby
Tell me, tell me how you feel, oh yeah, oh
Don't it feel good to you, yeah? (Don't stop, sing)
[Chorus]
Wanna take you down, wanna take you down
Wanna take you down, wanna take you down
Wanna take you down, wanna take you down
Wanna take you down, wanna take you
